pages.text: $(li)Cow are large common passive creatures that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l) and $(l)Raw Beef$() upon death.$(br)$(li)They can not be tamed, but they can be breed giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l).
You can right click on a Cow while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/bucket)Bucket$(/l) to obtain a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/milk_bucket)Milk Bucket$(/l).
